categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Tactical Command Officer was a Human male who served in the Imperial Military of the resurgent Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra. He was stationed in the Imperial outpost of Camp Conquest, where he was killed when the base was attacked by the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython in 3642 BBY
